reviews.review: Игра отличная ,  софтеров нету античит хороший вообщем не советую

Counter-strike is the best FPS of all time. CSGO is no exception to the rule. It runs so smoothly, easily get 30-60 frames. I've played all the big FPS games, and counter-strike is still the best. 

That being said, the hackers are out of control. Once you hit a certain level, you can not go further. Completely out of control.
If you can find a good group of friends and avoid the hackers, it's not bad

Very good game and i like playing it.
i think you would too if you like shooter games and some excitement in a game.

This games is for all over 7 years old and is a solid game to play with friends.

Very good game overall
